verbose_text: P-gp belongs to the first member of the ATP binding cassette (ABC) superfamily, which is encoded by the MDR1 gene [XREF_BIBR], and is widely expressed in epithelial cells of normal tissues that are involved in drug disposition, including the liver, intestine, and kidney [XREF_BIBR].
